segments.text: Oh, hello there. I didn't know you'd be there. Well, I'm Dave Rubin, and this is the Rubin
Report Direct Message. Today is July 6th, 2021. Do me a favor, subscribe to our channel, tap
that notification bell. Maybe you never know, our videos will show up in your YouTube feed.
We possibly won't, but it's worth a shot, isn't it? Alright guys, we're going to get
right to it today. We've got four stories for you. First off, you know this Joe Biden
guy, he's the old guy who putters around and holds note cards when he's talking off
and is confused, doesn't know what he's saying. Well, now people are kind of picking up on
that, and a new poll shows that more than 50% of people don't think he's in charge, which
is interesting because it's a question that I asked President Trump about a week and
a half ago, who's really in charge, and then Trump actually went to a rally a couple
days ago, and then he asked the audience. The audience didn't know either. We'll show
you that. We'll show you the poll. The second story, critical race theory, which many would
just say is an idea. If you're watching the Blue and On Conspiracy Channel over there
on MSNBC, there's this notion out there that critical race theory sort of really doesn't
exist, or it's not really in schools, and yet at the same time it must be taught, and
it is their new religion. It's very, very confusing. Well, it is infecting everything,
and that's why I keep saying to you guys, we must build new things. That, by the way,
is exactly what I'm doing, of course, with locals.com, but the old things are going to
crumble, and speaking of old things, the newest thing that has been now basically wholly infected
by critical race theory, and we'll get into the details, is the teacher's union, which
basically is just, they're going all in. They are just, we will bring racism to your
children in the name of anti-racism, so we'll dive deep on that, and then men in women's
prisons. It's the new hottest trend, and it's happening here in California, and you may
remember, because we played the video during the election, Joe Biden said that it won't
be up to the prison, basically, to decide who is going to go into what prison, meaning
if you're a man, it won't be up to them to decide, it'll be up to you. How you identify,
that'll be whether you go into a male prison or a woman's prison. Well, it's happening
here in California, and you're not going to believe this, guys. There are rapes, there
are murders and other violent attacks on women by biological men, bananas, right? And then
finally speaking of bananas, New York, once the greatest city in the world, a place that
I grew up, that my grandparents lived in, my great grandparents lived in at times. I
talked about this in my book. In the early 1900s, there were dozens, probably around
50 people in my family lived in New York City, and in all the boroughs there, we now have
one cousin left. Well, I'm fairly certain it doesn't talk to me because of Trump's
arrangement syndrome, but we have one family member left in New York City, and why? Because
crime is completely out of control, and it looks like they will have a new progressive
DA, and he's going to basically decriminalize everything. Trust passing, looting, a whole
bunch of stuff, and basically turn whatever decency is left in New York City, and it's
hard to know what's left. They're going to try to turn it into San Francisco, and we've
got videotape of San Francisco, and trust me, it's nuts. All right, let's start off with
this Joe Biden guy, because it's becoming fairly obvious that he is not in charge.
I mean, I think everyone sort of sees it at this point. He often, when he gives these
press conferences where he has, I'm going to choose you, and you're going to do this,
and he always has his notes, and he has everything's pre-packaged, and he's always reading from
a prompter. But even despite all that, he is struggling to make coherent sentences, often
gets completely sort of sidetracked and babbly, and just sort of stares into oblivion and
everything else. The scandal, as I've been saying, is the non-scandal. The scandal is
not that there's something wrong with Joe Biden. That is a scandal of some sort, I would say,
right? Like it's a problem, would you say it's a problem, that the guy that we're supposed
to believe is the leader of the free world, obviously has cognitive problems? Yeah, okay,
that's a scandal. But I would say the bigger scandal is the non-scandal. The bigger scandal
is the fact that corporate press, mainstream media, cable news, all the respectable blue
check journalists, that everyone's pretending they don't see this. So the scandal is actually
the non-scandal. The scandal is the fact that we're not really talking about the scandal.
But the average person is picking up on it. So there was a new poll by Trafalgar Group,
and we've got some info here from The Daily Wire, a new poll released on Monday found
the majority of Americans believe that others are really running the show in President
Joe Biden's administration and not Biden himself. 56.5% of American voters do not believe that
President Biden is fully executing the duties of his office, while 36.4 believe he's directing
all policy and agenda. So that's a pretty interesting poll, right? Over half of the people
in America basically are saying they don't think Joe Biden is in charge. Now this is
the same exact question that I asked Donald Trump as I said about 10 days ago, and he
sort of said he didn't know, you know, is it the Obama machine, the Hillary machine?
I don't know who it is. I don't know. I'd love to hear your thoughts on who you think
it is. I think it is something like whatever is left of the Clinton machine coupled with
the Obama machine, which is directly connected to all the BLM stuff and the Antifa stuff.
It's just some really weird radical left thing, but like who's really funding it,
who's really in charge? But the simple point here is that I just don't know how you could
be a thinking person and believe that Joe Biden is in charge. He often during his ramblingly
incoherent press conferences, he'll often say, oh, I better stop now or I'm going to get in
trouble. I mean, you can find many videos of this. I'm going to get in trouble. They're not
going to be happy about this. Who is he talking about? Like really, who is he talking about?
Now I get it. He could be like being a little bit kitschy, right? It's a little bit like,
oh, I've said too much, I'm going to get in trouble. And he just means it as a joke. But
he repeatedly keeps saying it and it's usually not done in a joking manner. It's like, oh,
I just said that, I'm going to get in trouble. And then on top of everything else, they are giving

during those insanely combative press conferences. And by the way, I don't mind insanely combative
press conferences because that's sort of what's supposed to happen, right? You're supposed to have

scoops ice cream he had. And of course, when Donald Trump had two scoops of ice cream,
it was a big problem. Joe Biden can have as many scoops of ice cream as he wants. Nice sense.
Over the next couple of years, there's going to be a lot more soft food in his future.
But the point is he walks around with notes. If Donald Trump had walked around with note cards,
people would have said, you know, he has dementia or he has, you know, whatever other
cognitive things. But for some reason, we don't talk about it with Joe Biden. And I don't know
what we're going to do about this because it's a real problem. Well, Donald Trump is now back
given the rallies, right? He's out there with the people. And he asked the very same question
while on stage the other day. In just five months, the Biden administration has launched
an all-out assault on everything we cherish and we value under Joe Biden and the left.
I don't know if it's Joe, to be honest with you. It's somebody. Does anybody know who it is?
Right. Like, that's more true. Like, who is it? Does anyone know who it is? I don't think it's
Joe. Like, that's more true than most of the nonsense we're getting out of Joe or
Pasek or anything else. Now, I do want to just say one other thing on this, which is that I would

I have a pretty good track record here. I saw through the nonsense. I saw my good liberal

the somewhat decent lefties all saying, don't worry, Dave, Joe Biden's going to stop the

you're a socialist. You're an old grumpy socialist, but we know what it is. We know how to fight it.
Biden, it's much more confusing. But I do want to be clear about this, which is that even if I

the guy operating, right? Like, he's the doctor, and we're all the patient, and he can do a lot of

prefer that he has the cognitive wherewithal to make the right choices and know how to operate
and everything else. So when I say all this, I can joke about it in a way, but it's actually
quite scary if you think about it, that this man is not in charge. We don't know who is in charge,
and if he is in charge, if I'm wrong about all this and he is in charge and there's something

anyway, there will obviously be more about this, but for those of you in the mainstream media
that are watching this show, and I know you guys do watch this show, if you're on CNN or MSNBC or
one of these channels, why don't you cover this a little bit? And it will be more honest,
you'll approach will be more honest, you don't have to run out there and say, yes, dementia,
you don't have to run out there and say there's something deeply wrong with him saying, but you
can say that there's some questions that should be asked, right? Like, something doesn't seem

well, then it leads itself to a bunch of people not believing any of the other garbage you
spoof. So in many ways, you're kind of doing my job for me, but it's like, be a little bit better,
could you be a little better, then it would be better for everybody, or is it just too late?
I suspect I know the answer. All right, let's move on to this critical race theory nonsense. So,
you know, one of the things that's happening over the last couple of weeks is that finally,
because I think people like me and people in these circles and people online, it's very similar
actually to the story that I just talked about with Joe Biden, because the online people have

I shouldn't be, and it didn't even happen. So they want you to be guilty by the color of your skin.
They've decided the critical race theorists and the intersectionalityists at the Wogsters,
they've decided that things like being on time and working hard and empirical facts like 2 plus
2 equals 4, that these are tools of oppression and white supremacy and everything else. Well,
one of the things that's happened in the last month is as this has been more and more exposed

So breaking, the nation's largest teachers union has approved a plan to promote critical race theory

increasing the implementation of CRT in K through 12 curricula and for attacking conservative groups

is bad for America. But the teachers union wants to double down and impose this divisive
ideology on your children. The NEA represents 3 million public school employees in all 50 states.
They have a 350 million dollar annual budget and an army of operatives in 14,000 local communities.
So we've got a little more info on this, but before I get to that, the key piece of this
is that what we've been hearing for the last couple weeks is no it's not really in schools,
no it doesn't really exist. Well now we know it does. The Gateway Fund, it's got a little bit more.
